title: My Reservations
emptyTicket: No ticket reservations match this filter.

refund.title: Refund Policy & Agreement
refund.lodgingPolicy:
■ Refund Policy
- Cancel before 7 days of check-in: Full refund
- Cancel between 24 hrs and 7 days: 50% refund
- Cancel within 24 hrs: No refund
refund.ticketPolicy:
■ Refund Policy
- Cancel before 7 days of use: Full refund
- Cancel between 24 hrs and 7 days: 50% refund
- Cancel within 24 hrs: No refund
refund.agreeText: I have read and agree to the above refund policy.

alert.cancelFailed: An error occurred while canceling the reservation.
alert.ticketCancelFailed: An error occurred while canceling the ticket reservation.
alert.ticketCancelSuccess: Ticket reservation has been successfully canceled.
